title:
An elementary approach based on variational inequalities for modelling a
  friction-based locomotion problem
authors: Panyu Chen, Alvaro Mateos Gonzalez, Laurent Mertz
abstract:
We propose an elementary proof based on a penalization technique to show the
existence and uniqueness of the solution to a system of variational
inequalities modelling the friction-based motion of a two-body crawling system.
Here for each body, the static and dynamic friction coefficients are equal.
